casebody.data:
Richard BAGOT, Joan Bagot, Wilson Revelle, Darla Revelle, Mark Guillote, and Lashan Guillote, Individually and on behalf of All Others Similarly Situated
v.
JAMES HOLDINGS, LLC, Volkert, Inc., Parish of Jefferson and the State of Louisiana through the Louisiana Department of Transportation and Development NO. 2018-C-0124 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 9, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.

GENOVESE, J., would grant.
